original: Yassa kusalaṁ cittaṁ uppajjati na nirujjhati tassa kusalaṁ cittaṁ nirujjhissati na uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa kusalam cittam uppajjati na nirujjhati tassa kusalam cittam nirujjhissati na uppajjissati iti

original: Pacchimakusalacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ kusalaṁ cittaṁ uppajjati na nirujjhati, nirujjhissati na uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ kusalacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ …pe….
analyzed: pacchima kusala cittassa uppāda kkhaṇe tesam kusalam cittam uppajjati na nirujjhati nirujjhissati na uppajjissati itaresam kusala cittassa uppāda kkhaṇe tesam pe
yassa vā pana pe  āmantā pe

original: Yassa akusalaṁ cittaṁ uppajjati na nirujjhati …pe…. Yassa abyākataṁ cittaṁ uppajjati na nirujjhati …pe….
analyzed: yassa akusalam cittam uppajjati na nirujjhati pe yassa abyākatam cittam uppajjati na nirujjhati pe

original: (Mūlayamakaṁ cittayamakaṁ dhammayamakanti tīṇi yamakāni yāva saraṇaaraṇā gacchanti.)
analyzed: mūla yamakam citta yamakam dhamma yamakanti tīṇi yamakāni yāva saraṇa araṇāḥ gacchanti
